enum OgreOggSound::DELAYED_ACTION

Enumeration describing action to perform once a file has been loaded

DA_PLAY 
DA_STOP 
DA_PAUSE 

Definition at line 72 of file OgreOggSoundManager.h.

enum OgreOggSound::FadeControl

Action enumeration after a fade has completed.

Remarks:
Use this to specify what to do on a sound after it has finished fading. i.e. after fading out pause.
Enumerator:
FC_NONE 
FC_PAUSE 
FC_STOP 

Definition at line 62 of file OgreOggISound.h.
